title: Web Developer Intern
description: I'm directly involved in the full development cycle of internal applications, from discussing requirements with clients and designing APIs using Laravel to assisting with the development of admin interfaces using React. I'm also responsible for deploying applications to the development environment.

title: Junior Backend Developer
description: Contribute to the development and maintenance of backend applications using Go and Laravel. Involved in API design, database optimization, and third-party service integration to ensure optimal application performance.
